name: SpacingTime
description:
Spacing' Time!

This is a game created for the Kenney jam 2018 (Theme : Time Travel)

The goal is to survice as long as possible, while destroying ufos.

The ufos can only be destroyed with asteroids, you can't shoot them.

You can control the ufo's 'position/time' with backspace, use it wisely to destroy them :)

Some powerups will sometime appear to refill your boost/health

Your time control level will refill by itself after a certain time

Source code : github
